commit message: Fix issues with the wrong song or playing state being detected
Fix issue where the song would refresh when it shouldn't
Fix NullPointerException caused by odd ContentProvider behavior

Fix 'Ignore long tracks' preference

The 'Ignore long tracks' preference was not correctly working due to a
typo in MusicBroadcastReceiver.  This corrects the preference value,
allowing it to work.
